answer:
Tetanus, Diphtheria, Pertussis (Tdap) Vaccine is available for purchase from most pharmacies and travel health clinics. Contact a clinic near you in Richmond to ask if they have the Tdap vaccine.  The cost of the Tdap vaccine will likely be $45-50 but this does vary and adminstration fees may apply. Go here for information about why the pertussis vaccine is recommended in every pregnancy.
Immunization Nurse
question: I am pregnant. Where can i get a tdap vaccine in richmond bc? What is the cost?
